item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona eye Grimaldo amid major changes to squad
item.description: Barcelona are looking for reinforcements at left back, right back and on the wing. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Sanders rues 'rough' debut after Gabriel concussed
item.description: Browns rookie quarterback Shedeur Sanders made his NFL debut Sunday against the Ravens, coming on after fellow rookie Dillon Gabriel was concussed.

item.title: Source: Concern Rodgers has break in left wrist
item.description: The initial concern is that Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has "a slight break" in his left wrist, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

item.title: Eagles D makes statement, shuts down Goff, Lions

item.title: Mahomes takes blame as division title hopes fade
item.description: Patrick Mahomes took much of the blame for the Chiefs' 22-19 loss to the Broncos, an outcome that leveled the team's record at 5-5 and put their hopes...
